name: Operation Trick-Or-Treat
description:
Operation Trick-Or-Treat is an adventure minigame where the player must complete levels by tracking down all the candy in each, using the innate powers of various Halloween costumes. Can you finish all the levels? For extra challenge, try to find all the hidden coins in each level, or go for a record time.

The game is currently in Early Access, meaning new levels, features, costumes, themes, music, etc. will be added over time. A free demo is available now!

Currently, the only supported platform is Windows, but OSX and Linux may work via WINE (try the demo just to check). More platform support is planned for the future!

Patrons get this game for free as part of their subscription. Become a patron here for as little as $2!
